subject: Adding status field to image location

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Patch Set 1: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

Thanks for this good bit of hard work.  I would like to see this broken up into smaller dependent patches if possible (particularly the DB migration parts) but I do understand how that can be hard.  

Additionally it would be helpful to review this if it had its own blueprint.  I would like to see something describing the specific effort of moving the status to the location.  In particular i would like a document describing how the overall image status is determined based on the status of each location (EG: is it the most accessible location?  the first location?  is the image status removed entirely?)

There may also be a bug in the upgrade DB migration, it seems that existing locations will be marked as pending which will not always be correct.

Finally my own particularities make me want to see all state transitions go through a single point and not distributed through a set of if/else statements.
Uploaded patch set 2.
Uploaded patch set 3.

Patch Set 3:

New patchset patch-id matches previous patchset, but commit message has changed.

Patch Set 3:

Hey jbresnahan and markwash! Thanks for you suggestions (and those we discussed in IRC). In PS3 I changed follow items:

1. Just hide locations that aren't 'active', rather than adding a status field in the API.
2. Fix the bug in the upgrade DB migration.

Patch Set 3: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

(6 inline comments)

There seems to be a lot going on with this patch that could be broken out.  Can the parts deleting and handling encryption be separate patches?  If that is difficult I understand but there is an awful lot to take in here and breaking out functionality into separate patches (some of which i think doesn't even need to be dependent on each other) may help get this in sooner.

Patch Set 3: (6 inline comments)

Thank you John! the next PS will address most your comments.

For you separation request, I'd like talk this with you in IRC. I consider encryption part could not be separated since it dependent on the main part of the change (adding location status property).
Uploaded patch set 4.

Patch Set 20: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

Please break this patch up into a few parts. It seems like we could break it up into the core migration, then adding it to the db api and using it in the domain/apis, and then using it for new scrubber features. It will make it easier to review the code if it is split up.

I have added some initial review. Mostly they are just questions, but I think I'll start working on adding a LocationsRepo to the domain so that we can make some things easier in this patch, especially the db api changes that are needed.
